name: version-from-git
description: Bump package.json version to pre-release tagged with Git branch and short commit hash, 1.0.0-main.1a2b3c4

scripts.bump: npm run bump:prod && npm run bump:dev && npm run bump:auditfix
scripts.bump:dev: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.localPeerDependencies // {}) as $L | (.devDependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.bump:prod: PACKAGES_TO_BUMP=$(cat package.json | jq -r '(.localPeerDependencies // {}) as $L | (.dependencies // {}) | to_entries | map(select(.key as $K | $L | has($K) | not)) | map(.key + "@latest") | join(" ")') && [ ! -z "$PACKAGES_TO_BUMP" ] && npm install $PACKAGES_TO_BUMP || true
scripts.-precommit: npm run precommit:eslint && npm run precommit:typescript:production && npm run precommit:typescript:test
scripts.switch: cat package.json | jq --arg SWITCH_NAME $SWITCH_NAME -r '(.["switch:" + $SWITCH_NAME] // {}) as $TEMPLATE | .devDependencies += ($TEMPLATE.devDependencies // {}) | .dependencies += ($TEMPLATE.dependencies // {})' | tee ./package.json.tmp && mv ./package.json.tmp ./package.json

author: William Wong (https://github.com/compulim)
